sentences.en: The new law goes a long way towards solving the problem.
sentences.cn: 新的法律十分有助于解决这一问题。

sentences.en: Much of the time we do not notice that we are solving problems.
sentences.cn: 很多时候我们没有注意到我们正在解决问题。

sentences.en: It is questionable whether this is a good way of solving the problem.
sentences.cn: 这未必是一个解决问题的好办法。
